title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label height does not change right away.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a label on a page.
2. Modify the font size of the label.

Observed Behavior: The label's height remains the same even after changing the font size.

Expected Behavior: The label's height should automatically adjust to justify the font size.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a label on a page.
2. Increase or decrease the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the height of the label does not change to accommodate the new font size.
